content:
Section 9 - Insurance Guarantee Bond:
Insurance Guarantee Bond to Ministry of Manpower provides a letter of guarantee for a five thousand dollar Security Bond that will be issued on your behalf to MOM, with coverage included for all plans - Basic, Enhanced, Premier, and Exclusive.
questions: What is the purpose of the Insurance Guarantee Bond?
How much is the Security Bond provided to the Ministry of Manpower?
What types of plans are covered by the Insurance Guarantee Bond?
Who issues the Insurance Guarantee Bond on behalf of the individual?
Is the coverage for the Insurance Guarantee Bond limited to one plan?
What is the role of the Ministry of Manpower in relation to the Insurance Guarantee Bond?
Can I choose between different plans for the Insurance Guarantee Bond?
What is the minimum amount for the Security Bond mentioned in the text?
Does the Insurance Guarantee Bond cover any additional fees?
What happens if I need to claim against the Insurance Guarantee Bond?
